snippet: If the explosion turns out to have been a bus bombing, that would create further difficulties for the Chinese authorities, who have been dealing with a series of attacks.
abstract: Fire aboard bus in western Chinese city of Yibin kills one person and injures 19 others; fire is being investigated as possible arson.
lead_paragraph: If the explosion turns out to have been a bus bombing, that would create further difficulties for the Chinese authorities, who have been dealing with a series of attacks.

headline.main: Explosion Is Cited in Deadly Fire on Bus in China
headline.print_headline: China: Bus Fire Investigated as Arson
